A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was kind of a mixture between a remake\, and a crappy story without logic. I did not like it\, because Disney wanted it to be 100% safe to sell\, and did not dare to operate with new elements. With this part of the story I feel like the star wars universe is heading nowhere\, and\, again\, this episode does not add to much new planets\, species or anything to the sw universe (just like episode 7)
